elements.2211.03298_10fc6483938f8bb00021fc012c072: Advances of high intensity lasers have opened up the field of strong field physics and led to a broad range of technological applications
elements.2211.03298_5d5e08eb11d3416f08c2b7fb4cb52: Recent x ray laser sources and optics development makes it possible to obtain extremely high intensity and brightness at x ray wavelengths
elements.2211.03298_924e8f3f0b63901594ee9ab559266: In this paper, we present a system design that implements chirped pulse amplification for hard x ray free electron lasers
elements.2211.03298_694c6f04b3073bd75ebb68f805195: Numerical modeling with realistic experimental parameters show that near-transform-limit single-femtosecond hard x ray laser pulses with peak power exceeding 1 TW and brightness exceeding
elements.2211.03298_fbb40e470097894e171733ab93ec2: Realization of such beam qualities is essential for establishing systematic and quantitative understanding of strong field x-ray physics and nonlinear x ray optics phenomena.
elements.2211.03298_590ff1bd81de71e1a0029dfcc586f: High-intensity high-brightness x-ray pulses from free electron laser (FEL) have opened up many new routes of research for strong field physics
elements.2211.03298_d82e7e3f12876cc5ff25b5561b447: , non-linear x-ray optics, and many potential applications
elements.2211.03298_f922bdc781df8a7f5e7870b22b809: \cite{PhysRevLett.112.163901, PhysRevLett.120.223902, PhysRevLett.120.023901, schori2017parametric, sofer2019observation, krebs2021theory, kroll2018stimulated, glover2012x, marcus2014free, PhysRevB.72.235110}
elements.2211.03298_cbeb27ad5629a606e8677caa3d821: While the past decade have witnessed many
elements.2211.03298_ffb6cefcc0e9e52344688cd77c25f: , one major obstacle towards a quantitative, systematic and application-oriented understanding of the subject came from the stochastic temporal and spectral structure of the pulses
elements.2211.03298_f2b1083820d5a2b4fc7bc75140b02: Production of Terawatt-femtosecond (TW-fs) hard x ray pulses with full spatial and temporal coherence is therefore highly desired
elements.2211.03298_da61e819e2c5bcac4b69e344cb339: This calls for allround-improvement of the x ray beam quality, including peak intensity, peak brightness, and a well defined spatial temporal profile, which are mandatory for quantitative analysis and prediction of the nonlinear observables
elements.2211.03298_fe76e038d2fd55862fcf6e854c18d: Currently, the peak power of a state-of-art free electron laser (FEL) can reach 100
elements.2211.03298_dc9e7e749a3efecdb0d40beaf75cf: To push the peak power into TW scale, several enhanced-SASE schemes
elements.2211.03298_457bf69e305758cf554f0ec944679: have projected terawatt-attosecond (TW-as) output by using extremely high peak current
elements.2211.03298_b8a07182d6683dc0b695294b5e3d7: was shown to be capable of delivering TW hard x-ray pulses with a sequence of short electron bunches and electron and optical delay devices
elements.2211.03298_4fa74dd6e534750db291876e7128c: These approaches still inherited the rugged temporal characteristics of SASE, while also requiring electron beam parameters beyond the current state-of-art
elements.2211.03298_db5464638b3aba92290f935a6bea2: Self-seeding techniques were adopted to improve the temporal coherence up on SASE
elements.2211.03298_164bce4b69a5cf5bf7a439b65d36b: However, the narrow bandwidth puts a limit on attainable pulse duration and peak power
elements.2211.03298_b03a3215b65078d3026b9fbe47e52: In this letter, we present the design and performance evaluation of a hard x-ray chirped pulse amplification (CPA) setup, that can potentially deliver single-femtosecond x-ray pulses with a clean temporal profile and provide high peak power (
elements.2211.03298_31b60d5f6b2149e679c298c5ee1c6: TW) and high peak spectral brightness at the same time
elements.2211.03298_4e288b4b13bee7fa0805d523856cd: At optical wavelength, CPA has revolutionized high intensity pulse generation and its applications
elements.2211.03298_d76703be73ba0f9f435784d0867b3: The concept has been extended to the extreme-ultraviolet wavelengths
elements.2211.03298_f5a4ac11e4ba7278f5b144dd2ac8a: used chirped electron bunches to generate chirped x ray pulses before the compression by an optical compressor
elements.2211.03298_86538853fa82ea53ce1e5babb0c02: showed that, however, electron bunch manipulation alone cannot produce temporal chirp of sufficient magnitude and quality, leading to limited compression ratio and low photon throughput at the compressor
elements.2211.03298_76034b2914818d1b16c7b5d49688e: We overcome this limitation by a complete CPA scheme consists of both optical stretcher and compressor
elements.2211.03298_f8c8dd9c9804fb44f3c7796ebcf8c: This gave us precise control of the temporal chirp, realizing two seemingly competing quantities in an FEL: a relatively wide bandwidth required by the short final pulse duration and the long and uniform pulse temporal profile during amplification to extract as much energy from the electron bunch as possible, simultaneously
elements.2211.03298_a4447fd6bfa3bc796bf889ce7c4bb: The system design is illustrated schematically in Figure
elements.2211.03298_05aa9f26d7386ad74f5b433b86dee: (a), where bold green labels are used to indicate the name of different parts.
elements.2211.03298_be1a67511715c83127863341d17e4: In this hypothetical setup, the undulator segments are divided into two groups: the seed section and the amplifier section
elements.2211.03298_ff4a9b698d0563b576f904337af97: We use two electron bunches with nanosecond time separation
elements.2211.03298_a3dfe5e8a5479df380e08e3039bb5: to serve as the seed and amplification gain media respectively
elements.2211.03298_38ac9c1436ad938bbc2a8a94b21d3: The seed electron bunch is short with high peak current
elements.2211.03298_1e352d3b7e2761b22af38a142bedd: The amplifier electron bunch is longer and contains higher total charge
elements.2211.03298_33930b84168c9a69675e0519af121: In the seed section, the first electron bunch produces a short and intense hard x ray pulse while the trailing amplifier electron bunch travels along a lasing-suppressed orbit
elements.2211.03298_11f7ce75c7f1299e150f82c4d8a4d: Exiting the seed section, the seed pulse propagates through a crystal-optic stretcher, and obtains a strong temporal chirp while expanding significantly in pulse duration, matching that of the amplifier electron bunch
elements.2211.03298_66f458f7548225b881cad3285c1e9: The electron bunches are diverted away from the stretcher optics after the seed section with a magnetic chicane
elements.2211.03298_507c4003d3eeb3d21db26f3f95d5b: The crystal stretcher introduces a time delay to the seed x ray pulse by the exact amount as the time spacing between the seed and amplifier electron bunches
elements.2211.03298_0f6254b4ac8449b18450a84e8302d: This enables interaction between the stretched seed x ray pulse and the second electron bunch to achieve amplification in the amplifier section of the undulator, where the seed electron bunch is directed to a lasing-suppressed orbit
elements.2211.03298_a2bcfcc86fd167f82a368bc8a90be: Exiting the amplifier section, both electron bunches are diverted to the electron beam dump
elements.2211.03298_6a277f1fa990602fd3a6d96d6b742: The amplified, saturated, and chirped hard x ray pulse propagates downstream to a crystal optic compressor, where we remove the temporal chirp to reach a much shorter pulse duration and higher peak power
elements.2211.03298_4656351609ce25c1a53aa1f267744: To understand the potential performance envelop of this CPA scheme, detailed numerical modeling is required
elements.2211.03298_89cb934603b4a572523cdf23e0109: The chosen electron beam parameters for the seed and amplifier bunches are summarized in Table
elements.2211.03298_ca6a2ca9016639007b09535eb390f: , all of which have been demonstrated at many current FEL facilities, such as LCLS
elements.2211.03298_44c568f110b4dd800fe6115aeb458: A total of 32 undulator segments as currently installed at the LCLS-II hard x-ray beamline were assumed
elements.2211.03298_515eb7753b589f7d4cd2e99a42649: to predict the electron lasing dynamics in both undulator sections
elements.2211.03298_338c8f648ddd18b8e7c0a850926a6: The crystal optics is simulated with a homebuild beam propagation program, the source code of which can be found in Ref
elements.2211.03298_6ed28571e959e589a2b91b3d210a8: is used to describe the reflection, angular dispersion and absorption of crystal optics and transmission optics
elements.2211.03298_c2615e0a7759a01cf764fc1cddc75: The operation photon energy is chosen to be 9.5

elements.2211.03298_5c55bd61fdbecd7e038e1cb4b72a3: To summarize, detailed feasibility study showed that by extending chirped pulse amplification to hard x ray wavelengths using crystal optics based pulse stretcher and compressors, near-transform-limited TW-fs hard x ray pulses can be consistently generated, using electron beam parameters well within the reach of existing free electron laser facilities
elements.2211.03298_b62905f69705f89b0731e3aa4f499: The resulting high peak power and brightness will greatly enhance the performance of many current x ray FEL experiments such as nonlinear x-ray spectroscopy based on various emerging nonlinear x-ray optics phenomena
elements.2211.03298_0b740e92c593ae10483be974b0f44: This opens up new opportunities to track, understand, and control electronic processes in molecules
elements.2211.03298_8da9db89957ee680b37527e0784e1: The relatively narrow bandwidth of x ray pulses and the resulting clean temporal structure of the x-ray pulses will greatly facilitate the quantitative data interpretation of higher order x ray nonlinear phenomena, a prerequisite for developing future applications
elements.2211.03298_7f3b2bd187a274a1db953910592c0: The proposed optical layout is flexible in optics parameters, can be tailored for different photon energies, and optimized for different existing x ray FEL facility infrastructures
elements.2211.03298_1336fb173028b31f1a6eea3d45c4f: Further advancement in electron beam parameters, utilization of higher compression ratio, availability of additional undulator length, will enable another leap in peak power and brightness
elements.2211.03298_bb6198a29e7f78bcbd0075dc00be2: The proposed approach is also another example of a concerted-action between electron beam optics and x-ray optics for advancing x ray FEL performance
elements.2211.03298_5c6990879e6827357f935118efa0e: One can expect that, in the near future, coherent interplay between crystal optics and free-electron-laser can further enhance our capability to control the lasing dynamics of high brightness electron beams
